Bot process
- Handels discord integration of the API

REST API process
- handles all functionality & database interactions

Database
- mongodb

Cronjob process
- handles all automatic functions such as daily regenerations in game etc

marketing process
- handles pushing guild counts to various sites and getting vote info into database
